content: Hey @wg-incr-comp we're having a meeting in just over an hour from now :wave:
zoom link: https://zoom.us/j/91607200635
(and this time I’ve set it up as a recurring meeting, the way it should have been, so that link should remain usable in future.)
I won't be able to make it this week - I don't have an update anyway.
@Wesley Wiser I’m guessing we might not have too much attendance; I think @Santiago Pastorino has other things
and I don’t have an update either. Do you think we would be using the time productively in a synchronous meeting? Or should be cancel this one?
Or rather: I’m going to cancel it. I need to work on other things, and if @Wesley Wiser has stuff to report, it would probably be best if it were just posted in this topic. :)
That's fine! I can use the time to look at @mw's PR
Hey @wg-incr-comp , do people think they will be around for the scheduled meeting tomorrow?
I will be around
okay great. For once I’m going to try to have something prepared in time for the meeting itself.
lately I've been involved in other compiler efforts and also studying some stuff in a deeper way, so I don't see me actively working on incremental in the short future
I don't have anything to report, so will skip the meeting. I hope to be contributing more again soon, just keeping on top of my review queue at the moment.
Well, I will not be around. I got sick last night and barely slept. :sad:️
oh no!
Okay well then it sounds like we won’t have anyone but me for a meeting

the main things I was hoping to discuss were compiler-team#391 “Staged queries”. (I had thought that compiler-team#392 "Do not traverse the HIR to generate metadata” might also be relevant, but on review I’m not sure why I thought that.)

But since it seems like we’re not going to have a synchronous meeting today, I’d like to at least figure out how we can drive forward discussion of compiler-team#391. The most obvious thing is to try to send everyone here over to #t-compiler/major changes > Staged queries compiler-team#391
Hey @wg-incr-comp , our next meeting is supposed to start in about 17 minutes
I suspect I cannot attend for most of the meeting, but I should be able to start the zoom session and then hand it off to @Wesley Wiser or someone else to drive
I can drive but let's see if anyone else is planning to attend.
Please leave a comment if you're planning to attend

Unfortunately, nothing has changed for me in the last two weeks:

davidtwco said:

I don't have anything to report, so will skip the meeting. I hope to be contributing more again soon, just keeping on top of my review queue at the moment.
zoom link: https://zoom.us/j/91607200635
hmm @Wesley Wiser should we cancel this meeting too then?
Yeah, I think that makes sense.
I was hoping we could discuss the compiler MCP's that I linked two weeks ago. But we can do that asynchronouslyt.
Okay lets cancel. Thanks for being ready to drive if it were necessary!
Perhaps we should revisit moving the meeting time?
Yes I think so
(I definitely cannot do the meeting today, not even if its via zulip alone. :children_crossing: )
